name: Epic Adventure Quest
description:
Epic Adventure Quest is an open-world 3D point and click adventure game. Explore the world by finding, buying & selling items, talking to characters, getting and completing quests, battling and evading enemies, as you work your way through a compelling narrative. 

This demo is the first playable build that is now available for download now! The project is still in its early stages, but you can join the discord on the link below, let me know what you think and be involved in the further development of this epic adventure game! www.epicadventurequest.com
